Package com.ireasoning.core.network

Interface Summary
SocketServer This interface represents a socket based server program
TransportLayer This class represents the transport layer for client side Socket or DatagramSocket.
 

Class Summary
TransportData This class is a data structure representing a byte array and its valid length
UdpSocketData This class is a data structure containing udp socket and packet data.
